nodes.text: Numa Nubbu was a female Sullustan who lived during the early years of the Galactic Empire.

Numa was the sister of Nib Nubbu, and after their parents were killed in an industrial accident, Numa was raised by her brother. Together, they traveled from system to system, carrying out various scams. However, while on the planet Daimar, they were arrested by the local authorities after they attempted to scam a merchant. After spending months in prison, Nib was released to assist the local authorities by using his underworld contacts to help aide a mission to the planet Byrsym. In return, both Nib and Numa were freed and the authorities promised to protect Numa from the Galactic Empire.
